description.en: Legends of Equestria is a free-to-play MMORPG, available to play right now in Open Access! The in-development game is full of adventures, magic, and small horses. You will be able to fly, dance, play with pets, and more with friends or by yourself.
description.ga_IE: Is MMORPG saor-le-imirt é Legends of Equestria, ar fáil le himirt anois i rochtain oscailte!Tá an cluiche in-fhorbairt lán de eachtraí, draíocht, agus capaill bheaga.Beidh tú in ann eitilt, damhsa, súgradh le peataí, agus níos mó le cairde nó leat féin.
